parsed.recap:
DEV: Rance's latent mage-gift exploded during bandit attack; obliterated Lisle village; Companion Senta arrived and Chose him; discovered red robes hidden under bandit clothing; Rance stabilized from Gift-shock; traveled to Haven; arrived at Collegium; Rance/Talia full mind-merge during memory recovery; Rance now possesses all Talia's knowledge/training; Mage-Gift confirmed—first since Vanyel; evidence confirms Karsite Sun-Priests using blood magic/taking live captives from Lisle; Circle briefed under secrecy; Rance quartered at Healer's cottage in Companion's Field.

PEND: Talia's recovery uncertain; diplomatic inquiries to neighboring kingdoms about Karsite activity; Mage-Gift training with no living teachers; political implications of two people with Queen's Own knowledge; Karsite blood magic threat.

entities.c: village destroyed by Rance's uncontrolled Gift during bandit attack
